marklogic.body:
Act like thugs. Accidents may happen or aggravated murder who knows. Zimmerman may be guilty of putting himself in a bad Spot. He may be guilty of murder. While trying to protect a community though. Who knows. It sure beats all of the murders committed this week that weren't by accident or bad conclusions performed mostly by which group? Gee I wonder.
You won't see Al Sharpton showing up to any black on black or white assaults or murders this week I guarantee that though. Hypocrisy at its best.
